mapper.select: select onemin_load oneMinAgoLoad,fivemin_load fiveMinAgoLoad,quartermin_load fifthMinAgoLoad,checktime from detail_load;
select onemin_load oneMinAgoLoad,fivemin_load fiveMinAgoLoad,quartermin_load fifthMinAgoLoad,checktime from detail_load where device=#{device} order by checktime asc limit 1;
select onemin_load oneMinAgoLoad,fivemin_load fiveMinAgoLoad,quartermin_load fifthMinAgoLoad,checktime from detail_load where device=#{device} order by checktime asc limit 100;
